title: Sweet kugel with apple sauce
ingredients: ['1 (450g) packet egg pasta', '225g light margarine', '120ml half fat creme fraiche', '350ml egg whites', '400g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g apple sauce', '40g raisins', '20g plain digestive biscuits, crumbled (optional)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
